args: If ya ask me, vampires comin' outta the\nforest at night sounds like a buncha\nhysterical nonsense.
The villagers near the Halidom are scared,\nRanzal. We can't ignore their concerns.
Yeah, but vampires? I mean, c'mon.\nThey don't even exist!
It's all just some wild delusions cooked\nup for books and tall tales.
I'm sure whatever villagers think they saw\na vampire just mistook a musty old\nscarecrow in the moonlight.
H-hey, {player_name}! Check\nthat out! Above the fiend, I mean!
That coat with the tall standing collar...\nAnd the blade dripping with blood...
Could that really be a vampire?!
Stay back, {player_name}!\nI'll take care of this thing!
I dunno if yer the stuff of myth or not,\nbut I bet I can beat ya down just the same!
Master {player_name}?\nMaster Ranzal? What are the two of you\ndoing here?
I'd not thought you scheduled to come to\nthe woods until later this evening.
What the heck, guy?! Don't give us a shock\nlike that.
The villagers asked us to come here and\nexterminate a vampire that had appeared\nin the woods.
Vampires, you say? The fiends of myth?\nThey're here in the forest?!
They were talkin' about YOU, dummy!
I have a feeling they mistook you for a\nvampire, Edward.
In any case, why were you out here in the\nforest so late at night? Er, and why are\nyou dressed like...you are?
I came to serve as a reinforcement for the\nnight's watch.
I fear our Halloween preparations have\nbeen delayed by the prolonged fiend\nassaults we've been enduring.
I wanted to nip this particularly irksome\nissue in the bud so that it might no longer\nhinder your plans, master.
I can't believe he saw that coming...
Under cover of darkness, one must be\never more sensitive to potential threats.
We ain't got time for a lesson; there's\nanother flock of fiends comin' this way!
Let them come! I'll not permit them to run\nroughshod around these lands.
Our schedule has already been delayed\nenough as it is!
My word, but they ARE persistent.\nThey just keep coming!\n
His strength is incredible... It's almost like\nhe's an actual vampire!
No kiddin'. No wonder all them village\ntypes thought he was some kinda\nmythological murder machine.
You accomplish whatever you set your\nmind to, and you're so strong to boot.\nHeck, you're basically perfect!
Hey, even vampires have flaws and junk,\nyeah? This old boy ain't no different.
As a butler of utmost perfection, I assure\nyou I have nothing remotely approaching\na personal flaw.
Aw, horsefeathers! Everybody's got a\nflaw or three.
If you're so insistent, then perhaps you\nmight enlighten me as to what mine are.
Yeah, well... Uh... There must be a food\nyou hate or...something?
Sorry, but I'm not terribly picky.
Okay then. What about a person you hate?
Is that the best you can come up with?
Well? Do you see now that I possess no\nflaws or weaknesses of any kind?
Well, it certainly seems like you might not\nhave any fl—
Wait! Hang on! I'm gonna figure out what\nyer flaw is, pal! I just need a minute!
By all means, take all the time you need.\nBut DO be certain to deal with all of\nyour actual responsibilities, yes?
Just you wait, pal! Ol' Ranzal's gonna have\nthe last laugh on this for sure!
Well, this got a bit weird.
Still I wonder if Edward actually DOES\nhave any flaws...?
